name: Film Flip
description:
Film Flip was made in Unity over one week for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam (theme: Rewind).

It is a 2D platformer where the level rewinds after you complete it, and you have to finish by reaching the start again. Complete it in a way that lets you finish in both directions! (And keep in mind that rewinding usually is faster than regular playback!)

How to Play:

Objective:

  • Complete the level by pushing crates and triggering trigger blocks (by walking over them)
  • Reach the movie projector to as the first goal
  • The level will then play back the events in reverse
  • Reach the start again to finish!

Controls:

  • Move - Arrow Keys
  • Jump - Z
  • Grab to pull - X (hold down)
  • Reset - R
  • Pause - Escape

Credits:

Braedon Schmidt - Programming, Music, Art, Design...

This was my first game jam, but second game overall. Any feedback is welcome!
